item.title: CVE-2024-24882|2024-06-06T14:15:20.606Z -- masteriyo -- lms
item.description: Improper Privilege Management vulnerability in Masteriyo LMS allows Privilege Escalation.This issue affects LMS: from n/a through 1.7.2.
